CS371

Some NLP Projects I’ve done while watching the CS371N: Natural Language Processing course at UT. Haven’t actually attended the class at UT yet, but there’s a youtube playlist and course page that is really useful. There’s actually 2 courses that go along with the youtube playlist, the other one is CS388/AI388/DSC395T: Natural Language Processing (online MS) which covers the youtube playlist fully. I’m still going through the course, and plan to make more progress in the coming breaks. Github repository!
